==Wisdom of Earthquakes for #tcdisrupt hackathon ==

Techcrunch Disrupt 2011 SF Hackathon is held At the day of just half year past since the huge earthquake at Northern Japan.

http://disrupt.techcrunch.com/SF2011/hackathon/

== Demo ==

http://memorial-calendars.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/pre2/index.html

This calendar shows memorial days of earthquakes on the globe.
This will help us to do something toward the next coming crisis. 

== Resources ==

  * Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_earthquakes
  * Google Maps API
  * jQuery
